questions.instruction: Study the picture and complete the text appropriately. First one is done for you.
Read the telephone conversation and complete the massage given below.
Health society of your school is going to have a Medical camp. Design a banner to be put up at the school gate to inform the public. Use about 50-60 words.

student_answers.answer:
NOTICE

The Health Society of R/ Sumana Balika Vidyalaya
has Organized a Medical Camp For Check the
health of people.
	It will be held On 17th May 2025 From
10.30 a.m to 1.30 a.m at School Main hall.

All are Invited !

27/04/2025
				Gayani
				Health Society

questions.instruction: Write on one of the following. Use about 100 words.

student_answers.answer:
The above pie chart shows the results
of a survey conducted among 100 grade 10 students
about the places they like to visit. The places
they like to visit is such as, most Nuwara Eliya,
Anuradhapura, kandy, Sigiriya and Trincomalee.

	According to the above, The majority
of students are like to visit Nuwara Eliya that is
30%. The minority of students who are like to
visit Trincomalee is 5%. An equal percentage
of grade 10 students are like to visit Anuradhapura
and kandy that is 25%. The students who
likce to visit Sigiriya is more than the students
who like to visit Trincomalee that is 5%. The
students who like to visit Sigiriya is 15%.

	According to the above information,
It is clear that the highest percentage of
students like to visit Nuwara Eliya that is 30%
while the lowest percentage of students who
likce to visite Trincomalee is 5%.

questions.instruction: Write on one of the following. Use about 200 words.

student_answers.answer:
The Importance of the Internet For
School children.

	Good morning everyone, Respect
principle madam, Honnerable there and my dear
sisters. Today I'm going to talk about the
"The importance of the internet For the school
children" I'm umesha.

	At present, In The internet is
most important Source of Our life. As we are
School children, there are so many advantages
that can get from the internet. Acct Actually
internet is good Source of information. There are
so many benefits of using internet. As a
examples, we can use internet For Our School
activities; Such as engaging revision exercises, we
can use internet and can study Our self by
using previous lessons in the internet. And also
we can use internet For watched difficult lessons
and then we can study different questions
from that lessons by using the internet.
According to these there are so many
benefits of using internet.

	Nowadays, There are Provide
Somany
websites to School children to make eassy
their education. And also the most one of the
Internet
most important advantage of information is
we can watch the previous lessons and
the other lessons to eassy Our lessons. At 
present, Internet provide us past papers of O/L,
Revision exercises, provincial papers etc. Another
advantage of internet is it provide us So many
Subject knowledge to us. It is There are So
many Subjects and languages all these are the
benefits of using internet.

	Everything has advantages.
Everything has two sides; they
are advantages and disadvantages. That means
good side and bad side. According to above
I had explaine the some advantages of internet
As the advantages, There are disadvantages also.
Such as Addiction to the internet, Health problems,
eye issues, Sometimes these most of School
children are use internet and they become
addict to the internet. In that situations, the
Sometime they become to Suit Suicide. So
you can understand that the how these
disadvantages are affect to Our life.

	Acctually, The internet is good
Source of information and it provide us
advantages and disadvantages. All these disadvantages
are affect Our life badly. Therefore it is Our
duty to use the internet very carefully.
At now Our elders have taken steps to
take to control misuse of it. Acctually, we It
is not a Our elders duty. It's only the Our
duty to use the internet carefully and usefully.
According to above we can
understand that how the internet important
For Our life. Therefore we must use internet
very usefully and carefully.

	Thank you For listening.
